attributes.action: make sure that miscreant students, who fall out of the university system, immediately repay every penny of their student loans.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many students every year are granted student loans, only to quit university in the first year. This student loan money should be claimed back with immediate effect, regardless of the current regulations on student loan repayment. Those who take out a student loan and drop out in their first year must repay the loan immediately, with the result that legal action is taken to recover the debt to society.
